attributes.action: Allow wedding celebrations to take place with up to at least 50 guests.
attributes.additional_details: Weddings are a celebration that are important to many cultures. They are a celebration of life and are a massive input to the economy. They are also a way for family and friends to come together and after the difficult process of the lockdown, then surely a celebration would ease anxieties and help people to see a positive future. I think if two football teams can come together to play a game of football; if schools can return; if workers and shops can reopen then allow wedding celebrations too.
attributes.background: Allow wedding celebrations to take place at any venue indoor/ outdoor across the country with up to at least 50 guests.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
